c.title: Search
c.des: 1.Right click on main page and select search button from bottom app bar.
2.Type search keyword in the search box and click on search icon.
3.All the audios that match the search keyword are displayed in the list. You can launch a audio directly from this list .
4.All the cast Images that match the search keyword are also displayed in the list. You can go to cast panorama page when you click on the Image
5.All the movies that match the search keyword are displayed in the list. You can launch a movie directly from this list

c.title: Top/Recent
c.des: 1.The shows which have better rating are displayed first in Top Rated section of the start page. This list will change as we add more shows to the collection.
2.The shows which are added recently by us are displayed first in Recent section of the start page. This list will changes as we add more shows to the collection.

c.title: Favorites
c.des: 1.Click on Viewall option in Main Page and then select your favorite show.
2.In detail page right click on a audio,songs and chapters , to activate the bottom menu bar. Click on Add to favorites appbar option.
3.To view your favorites tap on favorites appbar option from the Main Page.
4.To remove a audio from favorites , go to favorites page and use the Remove from favorites menu option in the bottom appbar.
5.In detail page right click on a movie to activate the bottom menu bar. Click on Add to favorites appbar option.

c.title: History
c.des: 1.Everytime when audio ,songs and Chapters are played ,it is stored in the history list.
2.History list remembers the last thirty audio.
3.History list can be viewed from the appbar section in the main page.

c.title: Broken links
c.des: 1.If you are having any problems in playing any of the audio you can report those audio as broken links.
2.Right click on the audio title to activate the bottom appbar menu.
3.Tapping on the Report broken link menu option takes you to the feedback page populated with audio name and link.
4.Click on the send mail icon at the bottom to submit. Information like time zone and device Info are sent along with the link.

c.title: Cast details
c.des: 1. Go to the menu section of the main page.view the top rated and recent then Select view all for top rated or recent, which takes to you the movie list page
2. Select a movie from either top rated, recent which takes you to the movie detail page.
3. Go to one of the movie detail page and select one of the cast to see their profile page.
4. Cast Profile panorama page has three sections with cast biography, gallery and related movies.

c.title: Live tile
c.des: 1.To add a video in your start screen as live tile, select a video and go to the show list.Right click on the video and select 'pin to start' option from the bottom appbar menu.
2.Click on the newly created live tile,it takes you to show list page.
3.To remove the live tile right click on the live tile and click on the unpin icon on bottom app bar.

c.title: Add Movie
c.des: 1. Right Click on the main page and select Add Movie button from Bottom app bar.
2. Enter the Movie Name.
3. Enter the description manually or by choosing web icon on the top of description box which navigates to the browser.Navigate to the appropriate web page and copy the text
4. Description can also be edited using the edit icon on the top of description box
5. Choose Category for the Movie Language
6. Choose Image for movie from local folder or online
7. Click on save appbar icon

c.title: Add Cast
c.des: 1. Tap on the newly added movie in the main page.
2. Right click on the detail page
3. Choose 'add cast'button from bottom appbar menu.
4. Enter the Person Name or choose from the Drop down list if the person already exists.
5. Enter the description manually or by choosing web icon on the top of description box which navigates to the browser.Navigate to the appropriate web page and copy the text
6. Description can also be edited using the edit icon on the top of description box
7. Choose Role for the Person
8. Choose Image for person from local folder or online
9. Click on save appbar icon
10.To delete the person,right click on person grid in detail page.
11.select delete cast button from bottom app bar.

c.title: Add Chapters
c.des: 1. Tap on the newly added movie in the main page.
2. Right click on the detail page
3. Choose 'add chapters' button from bottom appbar menu which navigates to youtube.
4. Search for the appropriate video in youtube.
5. Click on 'Browse files' button at the top right corner.
6. Choose the videos by selecting the checkbox in the Online Links Page
7. Click on the save icon at the bottom.
8. To delete the chapter, right click on Chapters grid in detail page
9. select delete link from from bottom app bar.

c.title: Add Songs
c.des: 1. Tap on the newly added movie in the main page.
2. Right click on the detail page.
3. Choose 'add songs' from bottom appbar menu which navigates to youtube.
4. Search for the appropriate video in youtube.
5. Click on 'Browse files' button at the top right corner.
6. Choose the videos by selecting the checkbox in the Online Links Page
7. Click on the save icon at the bottom.
8. To delete the song, right click on songs grid in detail page.
9. select delete link from bottom app bar.

c.title: Add Audio
c.des: 1. Tap on the newly added movie in the main page.
2. Right click on the detail page.
3. Choose 'add audio' from bottom appbar menu.
4. Choose the audio language in the pop up.
5. Enter the url manually or choose from the Drop down list.
6. Navigate to the page where audio songs are listed and click on 'Browse files' button at the top right corner.
7. Choose the audio songs by selecting the checkbox in the Online Links Page
8. Click on the save icon at the bottom.
9. To delete the audio, right click on Audio grid in detail page.
10.select delete link from bottom app bar.

c.title: Share This Movie
c.des: 1. Tap on the newly added movie in the main page.
2. Choose 'share this movie' from appbar in details page.

c.title: DownLoad Videos
c.des: 1.Right click on the video then Show the app bar.
2.Click the Download image on app bar.
3.After Download the video then show the status Offline on select ur video.
4.Download video appear in video library,if u remove the video from video library then doesn't show the offline.
5.Show the offline on video then Right click on the video deosn't Show the download image.
6.Show the offline on video then video playing without internet connection.
